class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        a = points
        n = len(a)
        minsum = maxsum = a[0][0] + a[0][1]
        mindiff = maxdiff = a[0][0] - a[0][1]

        minsum2, maxsum2 = float(inf), -float(inf)
        mindiff2, maxdiff2 = float(inf), -float(inf)

#         candidates = []

        for i in range(1, n):
            # c = [False, False, False, False]
            s = a[i][0] + a[i][1]
            diff = a[i][0] - a[i][1]
            if (s <= minsum):
                # c[0] = True
                minsum2 = min(minsum, minsum2)
                minsum = s
            elif s <= minsum2:
                minsum2 = s
            if (s >= maxsum):
                # c[1] = True
                maxsum2 = max(maxsum, maxsum2)
                maxsum = s
            elif s >= maxsum2:
                maxsum2 = s
            if (diff <= mindiff):
                # c[2] = True
                mindiff2 = min(mindiff, mindiff2)
                mindiff = diff
            elif diff <= mindiff2:
                mindiff2 = diff
            if (diff >= maxdiff):
                # c[3] = True
                maxdiff2 = max(maxdiff, maxdiff2)
                maxdiff = diff
            elif diff >= maxdiff2:
                maxdiff2 = diff
            # candidates.append(c)
        ans = float(inf)
        for i in range(n):
            s = a[i][0] + a[i][1]
            diff = a[i][0] - a[i][1]
            mins = minsum2 if s == minsum else minsum
            maxs = maxsum2 if s == maxsum else maxsum
            mind = mindiff2 if diff == mindiff else mindiff
            maxd = maxdiff2 if diff == maxdiff else maxdiff

            ans = min(ans, max(maxs - mins, maxd - mind))
            
            # m = max(maxs - mins, maxd - mind)
            # if m < ans:
            #     print("removing ", i)
            #     print(maxs - mins, maxd - mind)
            #     ans = m
        return ans
